Module Utility Functions¶

utility_fcts.acc_input_forward(acc_planner, node, lead_vehicle_param, acc_vehicle_param, t_react_acc, dt)[source]¶

Initialize list of nodes for forward search

Parameters

  • acc_planner – ACC planning algorithm

  • node – parent node

  • lead_vehicle_param – dictionary with physical parameters of the lead vehicle

  • acc_vehicle_param – dictionary with physical parameters of the ACC vehicle

  • t_react_acc – number time steps of reaction time delay

  • dt – time step size [s]

Return type

State

Returns

new ACC state

utility_fcts.check_feasibility(a_new, v, a_min, a_max, dt, v_max, a_cur, j_min, j_max)[source]¶

Limits vehicle acceleration to maximum/minimum value - considers velocity and jerk limit

Parameters

  • a_new (float) – calculated acceleration to reach goal [m/s^2]

  • v (float) – current velocity of vehicle [m/s]

  • a_min (float) – minimum acceleration of vehicle [m/s^2]

  • a_max (float) – maximum acceleration of vehicle [m/s^2]

  • dt (float) – time step size [s]

  • v_max (float) – maximum possible/allowed velocity of the vehicle [m/s]

  • a_cur (float) – current acceleration of the vehicle [m/s^2]

  • j_min (float) – minimum jerk of the vehicle [m/s^3]

  • j_max (float) – maximum jerk of the vehicle [m/s^3]

Return type

float

Returns

bounded acceleration value [m/s^2]

utility_fcts.forward_simulation(x_position_center, y_position_center, steering_angle, velocity, yaw_angle, inputs, end_time, dt, vehicle_parameter)[source]¶

Forward simulation with kinematic single-track model

Parameters

  • x_position_center (float) – x-position of the vehicle center [m]

  • y_position_center (float) – y-position of the vehicle center [m]

  • steering_angle (float) – steering angle of the vehicle [rad]

  • velocity (float) – velocity of the vehicle [m/s]

  • yaw_angle (float) – yaw angle of the vehicle [rad]

  • inputs (List[float]) – inputs [steering velocity, acceleration] of the vehicle [rad/s, m/s^2]

  • end_time (float) – end time for the forward simulation [s]

  • dt (float) – time step size [s]

  • vehicle_parameter (float) – vehicle parameter vector

Return type

Tuple[ndarray, dict]

Returns

right-hand side of differential equations

utility_fcts.func_ks(x, t, u, p)[source]¶

Vehicle dynamics for kinematic single-track model

Parameters

  • x (List[float]) – vehicle state vector

  • u (List[float]) – vehicle input vector

  • p (List[float]) – vehicle parameter vector

Return type

List[float]

Returns

right-hand side of differential equations

utility_fcts.get_date_and_time()[source]¶

Returns current data and time

Return type

str

Returns

Current date and time as string

utility_fcts.reaction_delay(node, t_react_steps, acceleration, dt, acc_vehicle_param)[source]¶

Function delays input of vehicle for provided number of time steps

Parameters

  • node (Node) – parent node

  • t_react_steps (int) – number of time steps the input is delayed

  • acceleration (float) – calculated acceleration at current time step

  • dt (float) – time step size

  • acc_vehicle_param (Dict[~KT, ~VT]) – dictionary with physical parameters of the lead vehicle

Return type

List[float]

Returns

delayed input for vehicle
